A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don’t understand all of the hate and disdain that some people are giving. For TFA\, people were like: “Omg it’s too much like the original trilogy\, UGHH.” This movie took many risks in the plot and some of you are now saying “UGHH\, this isn’t like the Star Wars movie I’m used to.” There’s no satisfying everyone\, but I think the movie did a great job and I was thoroughly entertained. Congrats to the cast on a job well done.
